db:abstract.db:para: Examples for the Qt Sensors module.

db:article.db:para: These are the Qt Sensors examples.

db:listitem.db:para: The AccelBubble example demonstrates the Accelerometer QML type.

db:term.db:link: Qt Sensors - C++ Sensor Gestures Example

db:listitem.db:para: The sensor gesture example demonstrates the steps for creating a C++ application that uses sensor gestures and the included shake sensor.
Demonstrates how to read the meta-data of available sensors.
The Qt Sensors - Grue sensor example demonstrates all the steps from creating a new sensor to using it.
The Maze example demonstrates the TiltSensor QML type.
The QtSensors - QML example demonstrates the QML sensors types in the QtSensors 5 import.

db:term.db:link: Qt Sensors - SensorGesture QML Type example

db:listitem.db:para: Demonstrates the use of SensorGesture QML type.
The sensor gesture example demonstrates the steps for creating a QML application that uses sensor gestures and the included shake sensor.
